subject.title: This Guitar Changed my Life FOREVER!
subject.author: Grisha Yeageer
subject.content: I've bought this guitar with all my birthday, retirement and saving money and I have no regrets. I take it everywhere with me. I recommend very muchie. uwu

subject.title: Very Recommend
subject.author: Not Satan
subject.content: This guitar will change life, weather for the better or worse, you decide. This guitar is not cursed. Don't listen to idot trolls. trust me, i have experience.
